dublin_core.dcvalue: This study employed a new method nonlinear method called back propagation network BPN to analyze the adoption model of telecare It is important to inform professionals of the need for medical statistics knowledge to better evaluate new technologies particularly in health technologies assessment agencies
Telemedicine journal and e-health : the official journal of the American Telemedicine Association
Exploring the acceptance of telecare among senior citizens: an application of back-propagation network.
